com.artreset.app.sample.service

Interface TodoService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RepositoryTodoService

    public interface TodoService
    Artreset Project의 Application 개발 샘플로 제작한 Service
    일반적인 경우, 웹작업Service의 코딩구조 및 스타일 등은 이를 모델로 삼는다.
    Author:
    Taehyun Jung

    • Method Detail

      • add

        com.artreset.model.Todo add(TodoDTO added)
        Adds a new to-do entry.

      • deleteById

        com.artreset.model.Todo deleteById(Long id)
                                   throws TodoNotFoundException
        Deletes a to-do entry.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the deleted to-do entry.
        Returns:
        The deleted to-do entry.
        Throws:
        TodoNotFoundException - if no to-do entry is found with the given id.

        Finds a to-do entry.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the wanted to-do entry.
        Returns:
        The found to-entry.
        Throws:
        TodoNotFoundException - if no to-do entry is found with the given id.
